trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you create an ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。
